attributes.action: Return the illegals to France or to their homeland.
attributes.additional_details: Recently the numbers of illegals crossing the English Channel has increased. A complete halt must be enacted before it becomes common practice to assume the UK border is open for anyone wanting to get into the UK illegally.
attributes.background: Asylum seekers must seek asylum in the first country in which they land. The UK has an increasing number of asylum seekers arriving illegally from France. France is not a war torn country. All caught illegally crossing from France must be instantly returned to France or to their homeland.
